Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Prohibits the use of glyphosate and products containing glyphosate in certain parks, playgrounds and picnic areas
Summary: Prohibits the use of glyphosate and products containing glyphosate in any park, playground or picnic area owned or operated by New York state, New York city, or any municipality.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the use of glyphosate and products containing glyphosate in certain parks, playgrounds and picnic areas
